name: ctUpdateFieldValue
description: Use this task to update a specific field value
author: cloudThing Ltd
helpMarkDown: You supply a fetchxml expression which retrieves the single record you want to update, the name of the field you want to update and the value you want to change it to.

inputs.name: fetchXml
inputs.label: FetchXml
inputs.helpMarkDown: The fetch xml that will return the record we should update

inputs.name: fieldName
inputs.label: Field Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The schema name of the field to update (string fields only at this point)

inputs.name: fieldValue
inputs.label: Update With This Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The value to use in the update
